name: Dr. Ayu Pratama
title: Lecturer / Researcher
bio: Ayu works on NLP and AI for Education, focusing on responsible, reproducible methods and practical student support tools.

name: Dr. Budi Santoso
title: Lecturer / Researcher
bio: Budi works on computer vision and multimodal learning, with interests in document understanding and applied AI prototypes.

name: Dr. Siti Nurhaliza
title: Lecturer / Researcher
bio: Siti focuses on Responsible AI, including fairness evaluation, privacy-aware ML, and governance practices for academic and applied settings.
